description:
Provide insight into the communication between the server hosting the website and the outside world and allows the users to observe communication and look for irrational or known malicious interaction.
			The static class that exposes this functionality can be found at Walter.Net.LookWhosTalking.WhosTalking
			Documentation available at https://firewallapi.asp-waf.com/?topic=html/N-Walter.Net.LookWhosTalking.htm
releaseNotes:
Major releases that add functionality other than optimization and minor bug fixing
			15 June 2022
			- Update to support .net 6.0.7 and 3.1.27
			- Update package references
			
			21 June 2022
			- Update package references
			
			4 May 2022
			- Update NuGet References
			- Update detection API definition
			
			10 April 2022
			- Improve support for capturing services
			
			31 March 2022
			- Add parallelism as well as change the signature of TcpProcessHistoricRecord.GetHeaders allowing for changing scope and volume of data 
			
			26 March 2022
			- Extend TcpRecords classes with Geo location if dependency for GEO resolving have been registered
			  Geo data is not cashed, the framework may frequently ask the same GEO data so SOLID principles should 
			  consider cashing the data in the ILatLong and IGeoProvider implementations
			  
			15 March 2022
			- update to 6.0.3
			
			5 March add base classes used by IDPS framework
			- Service discovery updates
			- Updates to talking service resolver 
			- Updates to Talking framework classes
			
			16 December 2021
			- Update to .Net SDK update 14 December for .NET CORE 3.1.416, and .NET 5.0.404 and 6.0.101
			
			9 November 2021
			- Fix package dependency on vulnerable packages from Microsoft by upgrading vulnerable packages
			
			08 November 2021
			- Update to .Net NuGet packages .NET 6.0.0, .NET 5.0.403 and core 3.1.415 
			
			3 November 2021
			- Add LookWhosTalkingService for IDS type frameworks

			11 October 2021
			- CodeSign the binaries as well as the NuGet package for executing in a trust-platform

			19 September
			- Update NuGet packages release for .Net 5.0.10

			8 Aug 2021
			- update to .NET 6.0 SDK (v6.0.100-preview.6)

			30 June 2021
			- Add .Net 6.0 binaries to the nuget package

			15 June 2021
			- Update to .Net Core 3.1.17 and .Net 5.0.8 SDK

			09 June 2021
			- Update to .Net SDK 5.0.301 and 3.1.410

			07 June 2021
			- Update NuGet Package references

			31 May 2021
			- Update and detect ARP attacks/ changes

			12 April 2021
			- Update to new code base after .net security violation fix

			05 April 2021
			- Update process data processing

			22 March 2021
			- Performance update

			15 March 2021
			- Update storage schema

			05 March 2021
			- Update package reference
			04 March 2021
			- Update talking to skip command-line processes if fail

			12 February 2021
			- Framework extension changes
			- Update package references

			30 January 2021
			- Update database repository bug

			25 January 2021
			- Update extension methods
			- Update package references

			02 January 2021
			- Updated terms and conditions to REL. 2021.01.02

			29 December 2020
			- Extend Storage interface and Documentation interfaces

			26 December 2020
			- Add ISP to TcpProcessRecord and allow it to be discovered if a IISPResolver is injected

			23 December 2020
			- Add extension using ProcessExtensionClass
			- Update to enable GEO API if available
			- Capture more processes
			- Enable DI injection using LookWhoisTalkingServiceExtension class

			20 December 2020
			- Add Network type to the TcpProcessRecord allowing to capture the country of the remote IP address at time of the communication
			see https://firewallapi.asp-waf.com/html/AllMembers.T-Walter.Net.LookWhosTalking.TcpProcessRecord.htm
			- Add support for IPv6
			see https://firewallapi.asp-waf.com/html/AllMembers.T-Walter.Net.LookWhosTalking.WhosTalking.htm
			- Update package references

			19 December 2020
			- Add Location to the TcpProcessRecord allowing to capture the country of the remote IP address at time of the communication
			- Update package references

			16 December 2020
			- Update WHOIS agent dealing with offline activity by ICAN

			14 December 2020
			- Update package references

			11 December 2020
			- Update package references
			- Compile with Language version 9.0

			04 December 2020
			-Update package references

			22 November 2020
			- Update compiler hints improving .net Core 3.1 and .Net 5.0 compiled binaries

			11 November 2020
			- Update packages and support .Net 5.0

			08 November 2020
			- Update signatures and NuGet package references

			14 October 2020
			- Update to .net core 3.1.4

			05 October 2020
			- Update NuGet Package References
			- Update EULA

			2020.09.06
			- fix bug network scope
			- get start date if main-module access not allowed
			- Update documentation
			- Suppress getting process details from processes that
			will cause exception due to low permission

			2020.09.04 update documentation and references
			2020.08.18 update history requests to allow for detailed analysis

			2020.08.18 framework signatures
			2020.06.11.13 Add resolver argument error reporting
			2020.06.11.08 Add error reporting
			2020.06.02.02 Add discover all local network IP addresses
			2020.04.05.22 Add network communication discovery
title: Monitoring and auditing of the communications on the LAN and WAN network
